publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5076 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the National Theatre of Scotland (NTS) on its first anniversary; applauds the high quality of its productions and the popularity of the theatre since its inception; recognises the success of its production of "Black Watch" which was such a hit at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe and won the 2006 Stage Award for Best Ensemble; acknowledges the important role that NTS plays in the cultural and educational life of Scotland through projects such as NTS Learn, and pledges to continue to strongly support NTS to ensure that it has a long and successful future.

S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Bruce Crawford*, Colin Fox*, Cathy Peattie*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*, Jim Mather*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Christine Grahame*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-5076 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the National Theatre of Scotland (NTS) on its first anniversary; applauds the high quality of its productions and the popularity of the theatre since its inception; recognises the success of its production of "Black Watch" which was such a hit at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe and won the 2006 Stage Award for Best Ensemble; acknowledges the important role that NTS plays in the cultural and educational life of Scotland through projects such as NTS Learn, and pledges to continue to strongly support NTS to ensure that it has a long and successful future. Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Bruce Crawford, Colin Fox, Cathy Peattie, Mike Pringle, Rob Gibson, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Jamie Stone, Robin Harper, Frances Curran, Jim Mather, Mr Brian Monteith, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Christine Grahame, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Michael Matheson, Shiona Baird*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, Dave Petrie*
S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Trish Godman*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Susan Deacon*
S2M-5076 Happy First Anniversary to the National Theatre of Scotland (lodged on 1 November 2006) Linda Fabiani*
